info.name: Pirate Planks
info.attribution:
Game layout, library image, and scripting by Robin Harn, released to the Public Domain under CC0.

The following graphics are from https://game-icons.net and under CC BY 3.0:
* Card Joker https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/card-joker.html

The following graphics are from http://www.freepik.com and are used under the Freepik - Flaticon license:
* Plank: https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/wood-banners-street-signs-wooden-boards-set_32883319.htm
* Pirate: https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/pirate_48848
info.description: Position your pirates carefully on a plank of increasing bounties, but don't get too greedy or you'll go overboard!
info.helpText:
* Plank layout can go from 1 to 8, or from 8 to 1. To flip your plank to the desired layout, simply click on it.

* To keep track of who leads the first trick of a round, you may use the Cycle Lead button to change which player is highlighted on the interface.

* If a card in jail gets evaluated at the end of a trick, you must manually move it to the discard pile afterwards.

loopRoutine.comment: Default variable name is the name of the property, so we use that in LABEL below

fields.text: You're about to start a new round. Are you sure?
